project_descr: Strengthening access to justice, rule of law and human rights protection in Mozambique

outputs.output_descr: The project introduces and strengthens innovative justice instruments (alternatives to imprisonment, Palaces of Justice), increases awareness of HRs by vulnerable groups and establishes the National Human Rights Commission.
donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT

outputs.output_descr: The project aims at supporting the Police of the Republic of Mozambique to establish a National Crime Observatory.
donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
